List all packages in the tidymodels

Source: R/utils.R
tidymodels_packages.Rd

List all packages in the tidymodels

tidymodels_packages(include_self = TRUE)

Arguments

include_self

Include tidymodels in the list?

Examples

tidymodels_packages()
#>  [1] "broom"         "cli"           "crayon"        "dials"        
#>  [5] "dplyr"         "ggplot2"       "infer"         "magrittr"     
#>  [9] "parsnip"       "pillar"        "purrr"         "recipes"      
#> [13] "rlang"         "rsample"       "rstudioapi"    "tibble"       
#> [17] "tidytext"      "tidypredict"   "tidyposterior" "tidyr"        
#> [21] "tune"          "workflows"     "yardstick"     "tidymodels"

Contents

tidymodels is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.

Developed by Max Kuhn, Hadley Wickham, . Site built by pkgdown.
